headline: BD Named Among the 100 Best Corporate Citizens of 2024
summary: BD (Becton, Dickinson and Company) (NYSE: BDX), a leading global medical technology company, today announced it has been named as one of the 100 Best Corporate Citizens of 2024 by 3BL, ranking second in the health care equipment and services industry for its second consecutive year.
